name: Noddegamra
description:
You play as an asteroid that comes to visit Earth. Use left and right arrows to avoid space garbage, rockets and Bruce.

Credits

Programming — Sergey Manvelov

Art — Ivan Dukart

Fire by Little Visuals

Earth by Pixabay

Explosion by GintasDX

Sounds by 1o, LiamG_SF, nebulousflynn, SoundCollectah and sophiehall3535

Music by Simon_Mathewson
